name: cards
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool card_draw_simulator.
Tool description: Draw cards from a regular 52 playing cards deck with a variety of options.
API description: This function draws multiple cards from a regular 52-card playing deck using the Card Draw Simulator API.

value.description: The value of the card(s) to draw (e.g., 'A', '2', '3', ... 'K'). Defaults to 'all'.

suit.description: The suit of the card(s) to draw (e.g., '♠', '♣', '♥', '♦'). Defaults to '♠'.

back.description: Indicates whether to draw the back of the card. Defaults to 'false'.

pulls.description: The number of cards to draw. Defaults to '10'.
